trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class used in XML encryption from which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference" />, and <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference" /> classes derive.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base abstrata usada na criptografia XML da qual as classes <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference" /> e <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference" /> são derivadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os padrões de criptografia de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference.GetXml%2A> method in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> class to write the XML values to the console.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference.GetXml%2A> método o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> classe para gravar os valores de XML para o console.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a class that is an abstract base class used in XML encryption from which the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> classes derive.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma classe que é uma classe base abstrata usada na criptografia de XML do qual o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> derivam de classes.

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a scenario where you need to create a custom reference section in XML, use one of the inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: A menos que tenha um cenário em que você precisa criar uma seção de referência personalizada em XML, use uma das classes herdadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os padrões de criptografia de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: O URI (Uniform Resource identificador) que aponta para os dados a serem criptografados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> usando o URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `uri` parameter provides information about the location of the data to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: O `uri` parâmetro fornece informações sobre o local dos dados a serem criptografados.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a class that is an abstract base class used in XML encryption from which the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> classes derive.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma classe que é uma classe base abstrata usada na criptografia de XML do qual o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> derivam de classes.

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a scenario where you need to create a custom reference section in XML, use one of the inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: A menos que tenha um cenário em que você precisa criar uma seção de referência personalizada em XML, use uma das classes herdadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os padrões de criptografia de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uri" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="uri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: O URI (Uniform Resource identificador) que aponta para os dados a serem criptografados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> usando o URI (Uniform Resource identificador) e cadeia de transformação.

trans-unit.source: This class is an abstract base class used in XML encryption from which the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> classes derive.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é uma classe base abstrata usada na criptografia de XML do qual o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> derivam de classes.

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a scenario where you need to create a custom reference section in XML, use one of the inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: A menos que tenha um cenário em que você precisa criar uma seção de referência personalizada em XML, use uma das classes herdadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os padrões de criptografia de XML, consulte http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-encryption-req.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uri" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="uri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> object to add to the transform chain.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> a ser adicionado à cadeia de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> object to the current transform chain of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> à cadeia de transformação atual de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cache is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o cache é válido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cache is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o cache é válido. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache is used to maintain the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: O cache é usado para manter os dados criptografados.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that represents the values of the <see langword="<EncryptedReference>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que representa os valores do elemento <see langword="<EncryptedReference>" /> na criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to output the XML information contained in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para produzir saída de informações XML contidas em um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference.GetXml%2A> method in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> class to write the XML values to the console.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference.GetXml%2A> método o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> classe para gravar os valores de XML para o console.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.ReferenceType" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.ReferenceType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that represents an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que representa um elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: Loads an XML element into an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um elemento XML em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um tipo de referência.

trans-unit.source: The reference type of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de referência dos dados criptografados.

trans-unit.source: This property is set when using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida ao usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object sets this property value to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> objeto define esse valor de propriedade <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transform chain of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de transformação de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain" /> object that describes transforms used on the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.TransformChain" /> objeto que descreve as transformações usadas em dados criptografados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de recursos uniforme (URI) da <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to indicate the location of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para indicar o local dos dados criptografados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri" /> property was set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference.Uri" /> foi definida como <see langword="null" />.
